message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $110. This is the absolute highest I can go.
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $115, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. This is my final compromise.
